rules_text:
[i]Adoration of Magic[/i] – Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may scry 1, then reveal the top card of your library. If you do, exile that spell if it has the same mana value as the revealed card.
You may cast spells exiled with Yumemi Okazaki without paying their mana costs.
flavor_text:
[i]“Her ‘spellcraft' has nothing to do with magic at all. It's all replicated by technology centuries ahead of anything I've ever seen. We aren't guests or contestants here- we're lab rats.”
—Rikako Asakura[/i]
notes:
